body_html: I'd start small, changing what you need to solve your problem. When this PR is ready and all tests pass, one can always make another one. Meanwhile, I'll ask around to see if there was any special reason to not use get_variable in optimizers -- I'll report back if I learn about anything.

body: I'd start small, changing what you need to solve your problem. When this PR is ready and all tests pass, one can always make another one. Meanwhile, I'll ask around to see if there was any special reason to not use get_variable in optimizers -- I'll report back if I learn about anything.
